classData.comment:
/**
         * Additional CSS classes to add to the cell.
         * These classes are appended to the default ones (e.g. 'neo-grid-cell').
         * @member {Function|String|String[]|null} cellCls=null
         */
classData.description: Additional CSS classes to add to the cell. These classes are appended to the default ones (e.g. 'neo-grid-cell').
classData.name: cellCls

classData.comment:
/**
         * The field name of the data.Model to read the value from.
         * Must be unique within the grid instance.
         *
         * **Runtime Updates:**
         * You can change this config at runtime to point the column to a different model field.
         * The Grid will automatically:
         * 1. Update the internal `columnPositions` map (preserving sort order).
         * 2. Refresh the visible rows to display the new data.
         *
         * @member {String|null} dataField_=null
         * @reactive
         */
classData.description:
The field name of the data.Model to read the value from. Must be unique within the grid instance.

Runtime Updates: You can change this config at runtime to point the column to a different model field. The Grid will automatically:

  1. Update the internal columnPositions map (preserving sort order).
  2. Refresh the visible rows to display the new data.
classData.name: dataField_

classData.comment:
/**
         * Scope to execute the column renderer.
         * Defaults to the grid.Body.
         * You can pass the strings 'this' or 'me'
         * @member {Neo.core.Base|String|null} rendererScope=null
         */
classData.description: Scope to execute the column renderer. Defaults to the grid.Body. You can pass the strings 'this' or 'me'
classData.name: rendererScope

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered after the dataField config got changed
     * @param {String|null} value
     * @param {String|null} oldValue
     */
classData.description: Triggered after the dataField config got changed
classData.name: afterSetDataField

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered after the windowId config got changed.
     *
     * **Non-Component Theme Injection**
     * Although `Neo.grid.column.Base` and its subclasses are not components (they extend `core.Base`),
     * they hook into the theme engine exactly like components do.
     *
     * This is a powerful architectural pattern. It allows specific column implementations
     * (like `Neo.grid.column.Icon` or `Neo.grid.column.Component`) to inject their own SCSS
     * theme files (e.g., `resources/scss/theme-neo-dark/grid/column/IconLink.scss`).
     *
     * **Best Practice:**
     * Because columns do not render their own outer DOM nodes with unique CSS classes,
     * any CSS rules defined in these injected files MUST be scoped inside `.neo-grid-cell`
     * to prevent unintended side effects on standalone components elsewhere in the application.
     *
     * @param {Number} value
     * @param {Number|null} oldValue
     * @protected
     */
classData.description:
Triggered after the windowId config got changed.

Non-Component Theme Injection Although Neo.grid.column.Base and its subclasses are not components (they extend core.Base), they hook into the theme engine exactly like components do.

This is a powerful architectural pattern. It allows specific column implementations (like Neo.grid.column.Icon or Neo.grid.column.Component) to inject their own SCSS theme files (e.g., resources/scss/theme-neo-dark/grid/column/IconLink.scss).

Best Practice: Because columns do not render their own outer DOM nodes with unique CSS classes, any CSS rules defined in these injected files MUST be scoped inside .neo-grid-cell to prevent unintended side effects on standalone components elsewhere in the application.
classData.name: afterSetWindowId

classData.comment:
/**
     * Triggered before the hideMode config gets changed
     * @param {String} value
     * @param {String} oldValue
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Triggered before the hideMode config gets changed
classData.name: beforeSetHideMode

classData.description: Triggered before the renderer config gets changed
